ygData.subject: Re: nWo base
ygData.msgSnippet: Phoenix:: Join them.  It seems so easy, and yet, something holds Phoenix back - Flicker.  Every time she thinks of him, she remembers what she and so many

Phoenix::

Join them.  It seems so easy, and yet, something holds Phoenix back - 
Flicker.  Every time she thinks of him, she remembers what she and so 
many others owe him.  Phoenix realizes she can't betray the 
Predacons, if only for the debt she owes that one Pred.

The femme remains silent, waiting for a response from these 
mysterious black-and-white bots.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Wolfenstein : : 
> Wolfenstein smiles at how easily the Predacon femme had 
surrendered. However he wasn't completely happy with himself. He 
could show ruthless aggression if necissary but he was a honorable 
warrior. This femme seemed so innocent, he almost felt bad about 
doing this too her. 
> He losens his grip around her neck a bit, so she wont be choked, 
but still keeping a good hold on her. 
> Wolfenstein(in a whisper to Phoenix): Dont try to fight out of the 
situation. I honestly dont want to hurt you. Just go along with it, 
maybe even join us. 
> Wolfenstein(to all): So what about it? Will you let us join the 
brotherhood? 
>  "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" <cardhead649@y...> wrote: 
Phoenix::
> 
> The femme was already scared; Skulletron's and Wolfenstein's 
actions 
> don't help any.  For all the hell she went through at the hands of 
> the Rogues, she is still innocent in many ways, and betrayal is an 
> alien concept to her.  Knowing little about Hydras or Megatron, she 
> is unaffected by Skulletron's arguement.  However, she knows she's 
in 
> a tight squeeze.
> 
> "Flicker ..." she whispers so low even Wolfenstein would barely be 
> able to hear her.  "What would you do?"  Somewhere in the back of 
her 
> mind, a memory thought long deleted comes to the surface.  She sees 
> once again the horror of the Rogues' attack on the defenseless 
> convent she had once called home.  She sees Flicker stand up to 
them, 
> despite being hopelessly overmatched.  In desperation, she had 
> surrendered herself to protect him and her people.  Now, it seems 
to 
> her to be the only route open once again.  
> 
> "I ... I surrender ..." she says aloud, her voice choked from more 
> than just the wolf-bot's arm.
> 
> OOC: Do what you will, just don't try to kill her - she has a 
mutant 
> spark that can't be destroyed.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > 
> > : : Wolfenstein : : 
> > Wolf is shocked by his friends actions, but does see his point. 
He 
> thinks it over. As he thinks he can hear Hydras last comm message 
> over the comm unit. Hearing Hydras voice only makes Wolf agree with 
> Skulletron. 
> > Wolf deactivates his comm unit and draws his plasma rifle on 
> Phoenix. Wolfenstin grabs Phoenix around the neck from behind, 
> holding the gun to her head. 
> > Wolfenstein: I'm with you Skulletron. To hell with the Predacons! 
> > OOC: If my modeing on Phoenix isn't excepted then I'll change the 
> post. 
> >  LurkerAbyss <1641coburn@r...> wrote: : : Skulletron : : 
Skulletron 
> was losing time.  He had to act fast and act now.  He finally made 
> his spontaneous move. Skulletron:  I am here to spit in the face of 
> Hydras, and offer my allegiance to the brotherhood. He has his gun 
> aimed at the nWo side, but slowly spins around, aiming at 
Wolfenstein 
> and Pheonix.  He takes a step back. Skulletron:  Come on Wolf, join 
> me!  You know it as well as I do, this is inevitable!  Can't you 
see 
> that Hydras has smeered the Predacon legacy and is just using us as 
> pawns?  Megatron was the last true Predacon leader!...----- 
Original 
> Message ----- From: Richard Allen To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com Sent: 
> Wednesday, January 29, 2003 4:06 PMSubject: Re: nWo base
> > 
> > : : Wolfenstein : : 
> > Wolf moves up besides Skulletron, trying to figure out what he is 
> doing. 
> > : : Razor : : 
> > Razor: Speak quickly Predacon, you are testing the brotherhood's 
> patients. 
> > The preceding has been paid for by the 
> > New World Order 
> >  LurkerAbyss <1641coburn@r...> wrote: : : Skulletron : : 
> Skulletron's getting ready to resort to drastic measures.  He 
doesn't 
> even quite know what he is going to do, either.  But one thing he 
> does know, is that whatever he decides to do, it is going to be 
big. 
> Skulletron:  Look boys, I didn't come here to start a fight.  I 
> admit, I am a bit headstrong when it comes to facing up to enemies, 
> but I came with secret intentions, my own agenda. Skulletron 
> struggles with words and thoughts.  He has to come up with 
something 
> fast, and won't have time to think about the effects...----- 
Original 
> Message ----- From: Richard Allen To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com Sent: 
> Tuesday, January 28, 2003 3:58 PMSubject: Re: nWo base
> > 
> > : : Wolfenstein : : 
> > He looks at Skulletron, not knowing what he had planned for sure. 
> > : : Razor : : 
> > Razor steps forward a bit from the rest of the nWo. 
> > Razor: I am the leader here. What do you have to say? 
> > The preceding has been paid for by the 
> > New World Order 
> >  LurkerAbyss <1641coburn@r...> wrote: OOC:  Sorry for holding 
> things up, I've been really, really lazy in the last several 
weeks.  
> I'm back on task now, though! : : Skulletron : : Skulletron stands 
> still, staring into the distance blankly for a moment.  He then 
snaps 
> back to reality, ope, there goes gravity. Skulletron:  Wait!  I 
have 
> a bargain! He shouts out loudly.  He stops and holds his hand out 
to 
> the nWo defenders, gesturing to hold on for a second. Skulletron:  
> Please, get your leader, I can assure you that I won't waste your 
> time!
